mapper.select: select n.newstitle,n.newscreatetime,n.newssubtitle,n.newsclicks,n.newstalks,n.newsimg,u.* from news n,news_category nc,user u where n.newsid=nc.newsid and u.userid=n.userid and newsstatus=1 and categoryid=#{categoryid} order by newscreatetime desc

select n.newstitle,n.newscreatetime,n.newssubtitle,n.newsclicks,n.newstalks,n.newsimg,n.newscontent,u.* from news n,news_category nc,user u where n.newsid=nc.newsid and u.userid=n.userid and newsstatus=1 and categoryid=#{categoryid} and newscontent like '%${search}%' order by newscreatetime desc
